name: Bass Drop Isolations
description: Master controlled isolations and sharp hits that match the intensity of bass drops in dubstep tracks.

cards.title: Chest Pop
cards.description: A sudden, sharp chest movement that accentuates bass-heavy beats.
bulletpoints: Contract and release chest muscles in sync with the bass hit
Maintain a slight bend in the knees for better control
cards.summaryText: Blast the chest hit right on the drop for a crisp dubstep accent.

cards.title: Robotic Snap
cards.description: Quick, robotic movements that punctuate glitches in the music.
bulletpoints: Use short, controlled arm and hand movements
Lock joints momentarily for an instant freeze effect
Focus on exaggerated stops to enhance illusion
cards.summaryText: Snap into robotic locks so every glitch reads like a strobe cut.
